summary.description: An overall summary of the entire chat history until the most recent query, in as few lines as possible but make sure to the major components of old text al well

sentiment.description: Return the sentiment of the conversation as positive, neutral or negative

name.description: The speaker's name, if available. Use null if the speaker is unidentified or not mentioned in the text.

term.description: A term or phrase used in the conversation that might require explanationâ€”this includes pop culture references (e.g., TV shows, movies), scientific terms, financial or economic concepts, historical or political references, technical jargon, or any other potentially unclear or domain-specific expression.

explanation.description: A concise explanation of the term in the context it was used, aimed at someone who may not be familiar with it.

contextual_explanations.description: List of all terms or phrases in the conversation that could benefit from contextual explanation, regardless of their domain.
